defaultMessage: Drop an image file here, or click to upload a file (max size: {upload_max_size}, allowed extensions: {upload_extensions}, allowed dimensions between {upload_min_dimensions} and {upload_max_dimensions} pixels)
Drop a video file here, or click to upload a file (max size: {video_max_size}, allowed extensions: {video_extensions})
Drop an audio file here, or click to upload a file (max size: {audio_max_size}, allowed extensions: {audio_extensions})
The file cannot have type "{extension}". Please try with the following file types: {allowed_types}.
The file size should be less than {size}. Please try with a smaller file.
